addons.name: Mozilla Firefox hotfix
addons.description: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues.
addons.fullDescription: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues. There is no need to install this add-on; starting in Firefox 11, it will be automatically installed. For more information, see: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Features/Desktop/Add-on_hotfix

addons.name: Grab and Drag
addons.description: Enables Adobe Acrobat-style grab and drag scrolling, Flick gestures, and Momentum scrolling in Firefox. Useful for (older) pen or touchscreen-based devices for which these gestures are not natively supported. Not useful on Windows 8 touch devices.
addons.fullDescription:
Grab and Drag is not compatible with an upcoming Firefox release and is being discontinued. If you are interested in taking over maintenance of this addon, you are welcome to fork it under the GPL/MPL license. All code is available within the addon itself.

Please do not contact me with requests to update Grab and Drag for compatibility with any new releases of Firefox. I no longer have the time to do so. Thank you.

Note: This add-on was originally developed in 2005, for pen-based devices. It provided iPhone-style scrolling in Firefox several years before the iPhone was even released. Most of the important features of this addon are now native to Firefox on modern tablet devices. If you're running one of these (e.g. Windows 8 touch-based device), this add-on is not useful for you.

addons.developerComments:
***Grab and Drag is not compatible with an upcoming Firefox release and is being discontinued.***
If you are interested in taking over maintenance of this addon, you are welcome to fork it under the GPL/MPL license. All code is available within the addon itself.

For now, I can still be reached by email: grabanddrag at hotmathematician.com

***Please do not contact me with requests to update Grab and Drag for compatibility with any new releases of Firefox. I no longer have the time to do so.***

Thank you.
